attributes.action: Make all MPs and Ministers Pay Back aall expenses not directly related to their work
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like to see the prime minister take the lead and make mps repay all abuses of expenses

rejection.details: The Prime Minister and Government do not control the pay or allowances of MPs - the current system is administered by the House of Commons. Therefore the Number 10 website can not accept any petitions relating to MPs’ expenses.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
